doc:
John E. Burch https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_E._Burch 0 John E. Burch (August 17, 1896 – July 28, 1969), more commonly referred to as simply John Burch, was an American film assistant director, producer, and production manager during the latter part of the silent era right through the 1950s. John_E._Burch ( August_17_,_1896 – July_28_,_1969 ) , more_commonly referred to as_simply_John_Burch , was an_American_film_assistant_director , producer , and production_manager during the_latter_part of the_silent_era_right through the_1950s .
